data.text:
For those of you who need to become more familiar with Isaac Asimov, you're in for a treat! He was a prolific author with an astounding bibliography of over 200 books, including his memoirs. Asimov's literary genius predominantly explored the realms of science fiction through a historical lens. You can check out his Wikipedia entry to learn more about his remarkable legacy.

üì∫ Foundation: From Pages to Pixels üçè

For sci-fi enthusiasts, Asimov's renowned "Foundation" series is the source material for the Apple TV show of the same name. It's a captivating journey into a future shaped by the past.

I invite you to watch this recently published interview with David Letterman. Seeing how accurately Asimov predicted technological advancements 43 years ago is fascinating. Even more remarkable is how relevant many of Letterman's questions remain today.
